attributes.additional_details: Leasehold of these properties has historically always renewed, the people who have bought homes on this land place good faith in this fact before purchasing. Landlord is suddenly claiming halfway through the lease that in the terms of present lease it states that it will terminate this lease end with no renewal - this is not true, it is the landlord manipulating by using a play on words. Conveyancing solicitors did not advise tenants against buying as was not transparent to them either.
attributes.background: land owner announced to 125 tenants who purchased leasehold homes on owners land the leasehold will not be renewed, landlord is offering freehold of the land to the tenants at extortionate prices. If tenants cannot afford to buy landlord threatens to take possession of tenants homes in next 8 years

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to address the serious issue you raise.  

You could try contacting LEASE for more help. 
https://www.lease-advice.org/

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
